title: #35 Danny & Charlie Carver (Broadway's The Boys in the Band/Desperate Housewives), Plus #RHONY / #RHOBH Recaps & Miss Vanjie (Rupaul's Drag Race)
itunes:title: #35 Danny & Charlie Carver (Broadway's The Boys in the Band/Desperate Housewives), Plus #RHONY / #RHOBH Recaps & Miss Vanjie (Rupaul's Drag Race)
itunes:subtitle: Danny welcomes Charlie Carver (Broadway's The Boys in the Band/Teen Wolf/Desperate Housewives) to talk Teri Hatcher and working on the set of Desperate Housewives, gay Hollywood, Khloe & Tristan, Kanye's tweets, and more. Plus recaps of #...
description:
Danny welcomes Charlie Carver (Broadway's The Boys in the Band/Teen Wolf/Desperate Housewives) to talk Teri Hatcher and working on the set of Desperate Housewives, gay Hollywood, Khloe & Tristan, Kanye's tweets, and more. Plus recaps of #RHONY and the #RHOBH finale, and a chat with the iconic Miss Vanjie from Rupaul's Drag Race. 

*For bonus episodes of Everything Iconic, join the Patreon at www.Patreon.com/EverythingIconic Web: www.EverythingIconic.com Twitter: www.Twitter.com/DannyPellegrino Facebook: www.Facebook.com/PellegrinoDanny Instagram: www.Instagram.com/DannyPellegrino


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
